code: import React from"react";import Header from"./components/Header";import Image from"./components/Image";import logo from"./img/react.png";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";class App extends React.Component{constructor(props){super(props);this.state={helpText:"text",userData:""};this.inputClick=this.inputClick.bind(this);}componentDidUpdate(prevProp){if(this.state.helpText!=="Help")console.log("Some");}render(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{title:"\u0428\u0430\u043F\u043A\u0430 \u0441\u0430\u0439\u0442\u0430"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:this.state.helpText}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:this.state.userData}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:this.state.helpText,onChange:event=>this.setState({userData:event.target.value}),onClick:this.inputClick,onMouseEnter:this.mouserOver}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:this.state.helpText==='text'?'yes':'no'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Image,{image:logo}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"image",src:logo,alt:"123"})]});}inputClick(){this.setState({helpText:"changed"});console.log('clicked');}mouserOver(){console.log('moused');}}export default App;
